name: Subway Surfers Blast
summary:
Match, blast, and decorate with your favorite characters from the Subway Surfers universe! Solve the puzzles and unveil new wonders every day.
Billions of fans all over the world have been asking for more Subway Surfers games - now we are answering your call with Subway Surfers Blast. Solve fun puzzles, collect stars, decorate your hangout, and much more!
Hip, hop, bounce, and blast your way through the coolest game around!
